ComicInfo.Title: We Share Our Mother's Health; David Kohl: Phonomancer; Control
ComicInfo.Summary: As the Ice Queen of the Phonogram universe, Emily Aster is only afraid of two things: her past catching up and spending time in dodgy indie venues. In the latest of the seven-stories-in-one-night of the Singles Club, she's having to deal with both. Plus, two complete back-up stories featuring the art of LEIGH GALLAGHER (2000AD, The Witching) and LEE O'CONNOR.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 22:30:31. [CVDB160432]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Daniel Heard, Jamie McKelvie, Lee O'Connor, Leigh Gallagher
ComicInfo.Inker: Daniel Heard, Jamie McKelvie, Lee O'Connor, Leigh Gallagher
ComicInfo.Characters: Britannia, David Kohl, Emily Aster, Indie Dave, Kid-With-Knife, Laura Heaven, Marc, Seth Bingo, Silent Girl
ComicInfo.Locations: Brighton, Bristol, England, London, Memory Kingdom
